name: Ashirwad Caterers
about:
At Ashirwad Caterers, they pride themselves on being a renowned catering brand based in Bangalore. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for culinary artistry, they have established themselves as the go-to choice for all your catering needs. Whether you are hosting a corporate event, wedding reception, birthday party, or any other special occasion, they ensure that every moment is filled with delightful flavors and unforgettable memories. Hygiene and authenticity are the cornerstones of Ashirwad's catering services. They understand the importance of maintaining the highest standards when it comes to food safety and cleanliness. Their team of experienced chefs and staff strictly adhere to hygiene protocols to provide you with a worry-free dining experience. Each ingredient they use is carefully sourced, ensuring the freshness and authenticity that their customers have come to expect from us.
Cusines Offered at Ashirwad Caterers
Their delectable cuisines are crafted to tantalize your taste buds and leave you craving for more. With a diverse range of culinary delights, Ashirwad Caterers offer a variety of cuisines to cater to your unique preferences. Let them take you on a gastronomic journey through the following culinary treasures:
North Indian: Indulge in the rich and aromatic flavors of North India, with dishes like butter chicken, biryani, kebabs, and an array of delicious curries.
South Indian: Experience the vibrant flavors of South India, from crispy dosas and fluffy idlis to tangy sambar and flavorful chutneys.
Chinese: Delight in the savory and stir-fried goodness of Chinese cuisine, featuring favorites such as sweet and sour chicken, noodles, and fried rice.
Italian: Transport yourself to the Mediterranean with our authentic Italian dishes, including creamy pastas, wood-fired pizzas, and luscious tiramisu.
Thai: Embark on a culinary adventure with the tantalizing flavors of Thailand, featuring dishes like spicy green curry, Pad Thai, and refreshing coconut-based desserts.
Desserts: Indulge your sweet tooth with Ashirwad's delectable desserts, ranging from traditional Indian sweets to international delights.
Rajasthani: Experience the royal flavors of Rajasthan with their rich and hearty dishes like dal bati churma, gatte ki sabzi, and delectable Rajasthani desserts.
Maharashtrian: Savor the authentic flavors of Maharashtra with dishes like vada pav, puran poli, and lip-smacking seafood preparations.
Gujarati: Delight in the colorful and wholesome cuisine of Gujarat, featuring dishes like dhokla, thepla, and a variety of sweet and savory snacks.
Bengali: Immerse yourself in the culinary traditions of Bengal, with iconic dishes l,ike fish curry, shorshe ilish, and delectable Bengali sweets like rasgulla and sandesh.
Japanese: Embark on a journey to the Land of the Rising Sun with Ashirwad's meticulously crafted Japanese dishes, including sushi, sashimi, teriyaki, and tempura.
At Ashirwad Caterers, their commitment to quality, dedication, and customer satisfaction is unwavering. Their experienced team of chefs and staff are passionate about creating memorable dining experiences, tailored to your specific needs. From meticulously planned menus to flawless execution, Ashirwad ensures that every aspect of your event is taken care of with utmost professionalism and attention to detail. Experience the taste of excellence with Ashirwad Caterers. They look forward to serving you and making your event an extraordinary culinary affair that will be remembered for years to come. Be sure to look at Ashirwad Caterers cost, reviews, and photos.

name: Catering Inn
about: Catering Inn is a venture by super-talented and hard-working Mrs. Chitra Bali. Based in Bangalore, it all began when a friend working in a corporate office asked Mrs. Bali if she could provide office lunches for him and his team. She started with supplying 6 lunches daily, operating from home. By the grace of God, the business grew due to word of mouth recommendations and sheer hard work. Today Catering Inn has a self-owned well equipped 6000 square foot kitchen in the heart of the city at Yeshwantpura. They have catered for all Bangalore's major companies at one time or another, prestigious Institutes like the Indian Institute of Science, Indian Academy of Sciences and Raman Research Institute, many social events like festivals and weddings and continue to do so. Catering Inn has been awarded the 'Efficient Vendor' award by Phillips India and awards for women entrepreneurs.

name: Sami Caterers

All of the guests are always welcome, and their service team is ready to help and give you a memorable experience. With them on board, all you have to do is relax and eatâ€”they have the capacity to serve up to 10000 people simultaneously.
For your event, Sami Caterers offers a multi-cuisine menu. North Indian, South Indian, and Rajasthani vegetarian options are available, along with Indian street food like Pans and Churans. Along with this, they also have Chinese under the Oriental section and Italian under the section for Western cuisine. name: Kala's Kitchen
about:
"Kala's Kitchen from Bangalore is a premium caterer for weddings, parties, and events. Rooted in the tradition and good-will, they stand out for their quality and hygiene and cater to all kinds of food delicacies. Their diverse workforce has decades of experience in the cooking and service sector, specializing in all kinds of cuisines and their professional approach drives their business. Nothing is more extraordinary than presenting the most exquisite delicacies to your guests on your wedding day. Nothing is appreciated more than food in a big fat Indian wedding. So give your guests a delightful taste of all the specialities of Kala's Kitchen Catering and turn your wedding into a culinary experience for everyone.
Kala's Kitchen offers a combination of traditional Indian and Continental food with customized services for all occasions. It provides creative and inspiring experiences to make the event stand out like tasting menus, wine appreciation dinners, cookouts, single malt pairings, and many more. All the ingredients used will be of the highest quality and international hygiene and safety standards will be maintained all throughout the service. Kala's Kitchen offers you the possibility of witnessing the most delicious dishes provided and presented by highly qualified and professional personnel. They build a mouthful of flavours presented in the most unrealistic way, always according to your taste needs and requirements, and they pay special attention to the detailing of each dish and make it attractive and equally finger-licking.
A trustworthy company based in Bangalore, it has experienced team of chefs, event managers and serving staff to provide a variety of flavours, stunning presentations and friendly hospitality for all types of events and parties. With this company by your side, you only need to dream; you can leave the rest and witness your wedding becoming a culinary experience.
